summary: Project Coordinator with strong time management, attention to detail, and goal orientation. Effective communicator with experience coordinating cross-functional teams, managing budgets, stakeholder engagement, risk registers, and reporting. Proficient in MS Office, MS Project, SAP, and video conferencing; experienced in event management and training coordination.

experience.title: Project Coordinator
experience.description: Develop/maintain project schedule information using MS Project 2013; manage day-to-day priorities; facilitate project resources using Demand & Supply tool; maintain risk registers; escalate issues; manage project budget using SAP; facilitate meetings and event management for training and stakeholders; monthly reporting to Investment board and Portfolio Office.

experience.title: Business Process Co-ordinator
experience.description: Set up new WBSE for Capex and Opex Projects; arrange set up of new activity codes for new employees; Health & Safety rep for the team; coordinate staff moving to a new building; set up contractors; maintain contractor details; create and manage Purchase Orders; arrange travel & accommodation for managers; event management including catering, bookings & rooms; team purchases; manage access to online documents; coordinate meetings: agenda prep, audio & video conference setup, and minute taking.

experience.title: Project Manager
experience.description: Project manage a pilot to enhance working relationships with Government Department - Child Youth & Family and non-Government agencies; establish Differential Response principles; strengthen collaboration with agencies; facilitate cross-agency training; develop and implement new ways of working; communicate with stakeholders; manage the project budget.

experience.title: Te Rito Co-ordinator
experience.description: Coordinate and facilitate groups; assess, monitor and input Police-reported family violence incidents; facilitate case management meetings; organize monthly networking meetings; set strategic plan; project manage plan for coming year; monitor quarterly; manage Community Action Fund; conduct media and awareness campaigns; run weekly radio show with guest speakers; organize events.

experience.title: Strengthening Families (SF) Co-ordinator
experience.description: Convene, facilitate and monitor SF Meetings; maintain meeting records; prepare reports; promote SF processes to government and community agencies; organize facilitation training; supervise facilitation staff; undertake related project work; maintain discretionary fund.

experience.title: Teller / Investment Advisor Co-ordinator
experience.description: Head Teller/Teller duties: manage trust money and cash; provide quality customer service; reconcile ATM; coordinate Advisors nationwide; arrange venues, accommodation, travel and catering; prepare induction packs; produce monthly statistics and quarterly reports; review and return Investment plans written by Advisors.

experience.title: Customer Service / WINZ Call Centre
experience.description: Handled various roles across LINZ customer service, WINZ call centre, and related roles; also contributed to wine & food initiatives; volunteered with Women's Refuge Crisis Line and Victim Support.
